name: ems_user_telefone_loader_db
sql_load:
select 
				   t.TelCodigo as id,
				   pft.PFTPesCodigoPessoa as codigo,
				   t.TelNumero as numero,
				   t.TelRamal as ramal,
				   t.TelDDD as ddd,
				   t.TelTipo as type 
				from BDPessoa.dbo.TB_PessoaFisicaTelefone pft 
					join BDPessoa.dbo.TB_Telefone t 
					   on pft.PFTTelCodigo = t.TelCodigo
sql_update:
select 
				   t.TelCodigo as id,
				   pft.PFTPesCodigoPessoa as codigo,
				   t.TelNumero as numero,
				   t.TelRamal as ramal,
				   t.TelDDD as ddd,
				   t.TelTipo as type 
				from BDPessoa.dbo.TB_PessoaFisicaTelefone pft 
					join BDPessoa.dbo.TB_Telefone t 
					   on pft.PFTTelCodigo = t.TelCodigo
